biotools.summary: The Quanty-cFOS.ijm is an ImageJ/Fiji tool developed to count specifically Fos/c-fos labelled cells in fixed brain slices or more generally to count cell markers in 2D fluorescent images or on Maximum Intensity Projections (MIP) in an unbiased manner.

bioschemas.name: Quanty-cFOS
bioschemas.summary: The Quanty-cFOS.ijm is an ImageJ/Fiji tool developed to count specifically Fos/c-fos labelled cells in fixed brain slices or more generally to count cell markers in 2D fluorescent images or on Maximum Intensity Projections (MIP) in an unbiased manner.
